snippet: E-mails released Monday show a sometimes collaborative relationship between lobbyists for the company building the pipeline and officials in the State Department.
lead_paragraph: E-mails released Monday show a sometimes collaborative relationship between lobbyists for the company building the pipeline and officials in the State Department.

headline.main: TransCanada Pipeline Foes See U.S. Bias in E-Mails
headline.print_headline: Cozy U.S. Tie to Builder Is Seen By Resisters of Pipeline Project
headline.seo: Pipeline Foes See Bias in U.S.-TransCanada E-Mail
